entry.title: Rowntree's Randoms Foamies Pouch - 140g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Candy
Price: 4.59

Completely Unpredictable!

Like a fluffy pillow for your mouth!

Rowntree's® Randoms Foamies boast a fun and random assortment of gummy candies! Originally from the UK, this package of delightfully foamy sweet flavoured treats is a perfect snack for all ages. With prominnet flavours of strawberry biscuit and ice-cream biscuit. From ping-pong paddles to paintbrushes, ice cream cones to saxophones, every bag contains billions of possible combinations of textures, shapes, colours and flavours. You never know what you're going to get! 


140 g

You never know what you're going to get! A squishy, juicy experience that is beyond words!

140 g

entry.title: Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Pouch - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Embrace Your Punch

Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Flavours 

Enjoy Sour Punches iconic straws in mini form! 3 flavors of sour candy per bag: Blue Raspberry, Green Apple & Strawberry.

These soft & chewy candy bites are covered in the classic sour sugar coating and come in small bite-sized pieces. What is awesome about this candy is that it comes in a resealable bag! It will perfectly fit in your backpack or purse for a on-the-go snack. You can even try pairing these sour fruity candies with a snack like popcorn!

  • Low Fat
  • Low Sodium
  • Kosher & Halal Certified

3.5oz

entry.title: Mike and Ike Sour Lemon - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Just Born
Type: Candy
Price: 11.99

 Sour Citrusy Mike and Ike's for On-The-Go

    So you forgot your lemon ginger shot at home and now you're looking for some way to get your tangy, citrus fix? Try this sweet and sour alternative, Mike and Ike's Sour Lemon! Each pack contains a burst of fruity Lemon flavoured Mike and Ike's that'll leave your tastebuds stunned. 
    This box comes with 24 mini-packs that are perfect to take with you wherever you go. Whether you down the pack in one gulp, or share with your friends, we'll support you any way you want to enjoy your candy. 

Perfect for keeping your favourite treat in stock, for lunch boxes, or on-the-go snacks!

  • Made in the USA
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Fat-Free
  • Made with Real Fruit Juice

528g | 24 packs in one box

Indulgence Without The Sugar!

     Creamy, rich, delicious; that's all that comes to mind when letting Nips Caramel slowly melt away on your tongue. This recipe will blow your mind when you remember that the sweet candy you're tasting contains zero sugar!

     Every piece is individually wrapped making these the perfect treat to share with co-workers, friends, family, and anyone whose day you'd like to sweeten.

entry.title: Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy - 1.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Taste of Nature
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy

You'll be saying "Aloha!" after every bite! Juicy Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy is hand spun and packaged in a multi-layer moisture foil bag to provide maximum freshness.

A fun twist on a nostalgic snack we all love! This bag of Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy is packed and loaded with Fruit Juicy Red flavour! Surf into a tropical seashore with this awesome bag of Hawaiian Punch Cotton Candy! 

Check out over 100 Cotton Candy items here at Candyfunhouse!

  • Gluten Free
  • Fat Free
  • No Cholesterol
Ingredients

Sugar, artificial and natural flavors, artificial colors (including fd&c red 40, blue 1).

Produced in a facility that uses peanuts, tree nuts, milk, eggs, wheat and soy.

 

1.5oz (42.5g)

entry.title: Annabelle Giant Chewy Assortment - 35oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Annabelle Candy Co. Inc.
Type: Candy
Price: 33.99

Snack-Sized Blasts-to-the-Past!

     Give away a taste of nostalgia this Halloween with this deluxe pack of assorted Annabelle's retro candy bars! Whether you put these in your candy bowl to hand out or save at least some to snack on yourself (it's okay, we know everyone is a little guilty of this), these are some delicious treats that'll take you back.

     Unwrap an Abba-Zabba for a savoury taffy treat that you bite into to reveal the hidden, creamy peanut butter center. Tear open a Big Hunk for a peanut-packed, chewy, honey-sweetened nougat snack, or grab a Look! for that same yummy taste but then enveloped in rich dark chocolate. No matter what route you take, you're guaranteed a sweet ending!

     One bag comes with a boatload of sweet fun, clocking in at nearly a kilo of scrumptious, snack-sized goodies that you'll surely be tempted to keep all for yourself!

Trick-or-TREAT yo' self at Candy Funhouse!

35oz / 992g | 1 large bag

entry.summary:
Vendor: Espeez

Price: 2.99

You'll Go Coco-Nuts For This Tasty Treat!

    This is a truly delectable goody for any fan of creamy coconut! These Neapolitan flavoured bars give you 3 delicious flavours in every bite; Chocolate, Vanilla, and Strawberry. The moist coconut will melt on your tongue, drowning your tastebuds in a tropical trance.

    An honest blast-to-the-past, these yummy bars have been around since 1894! A classic snack that surely will never be forgotten.
